p: Kidneys were removed gently, rinsed with physiological saline solution (0.9% NaCl) to remove other debris. Following removal of debris each kidney was weighed and immediately homogenized in 50 mM potassium phosphate (pH 7.4) to get 10% homogenate. The homogenate was then subjected for centrifugation at 4000 rpm for 15 min at 4 Â°C. The supernatants were used for estimation of SOD, Catalase and GSH [ 22].
